name: THE STATE OF SCRATCH IN 2022
description:
A html back-up of THE STATE OF SCRATCH IN 2022 just in case it gets taken down

original description:

A hardcore platformer akin to "I Wanna Be The Guy" about saving Scratch from itself

Double Click the flag!

Most other controls are explained in-game

FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED!

Controls not explained in-game:

Press R to reset (works without needing to die)

Q to ???

S to skip boss dialogue

There's variable jumping
